articles.author: Ethan Gach
articles.title: Bugged Fallout 76 NPCs Are Looting Some Players' Corpses - Kotaku Australia
articles.description: Sharing is caring, right?
articles.content:
Sharing is caring, right?
At least it is when the person you lend your stuff to eventually gives it back. Some of Fallout 76s newly added NPCs arent doing that, though. Thanks to a bug, they can occasionally nab your prized loot when you die and keep it for … [+1226 chars]

articles.title: Super Mario Maker 2's Final Update Is Out Now, Here's Everything It Includes For Free - GameSpot
articles.description: The final update for the Switch exclusive includes a number of new items and features; get the full rundown here. It's available now.
articles.content: The final update for Super Mario Maker 2 is available now, and the good news is it's a big one--and it's completely free. The update launched on April 22 for the Switch exclusive, and it introduced an ambitious-sounding "World Maker" mode, in addition to more… [+1754 chars]

articles.description: Epic Games has finally succumbed to Google's pressure and made Fortnite available on the Play Store. Here's how you can download it and here are a few tips and tricks that will help you inside of the game.

articles.title: After Samsung and Motorola, Xiaomi plans flip-style foldable phone - The Indian Express
articles.description: Xiaomi may release a folding phone by the end of this year. The smartphone will have a clamshell-style design, similar to the Galaxy Z Flip.
articles.content:
